item.title: Getting Stuff Done Feels Good Again
item.description: It’s been three weeks since my last post. Taking seven courses in a term isn’t the easiest thing to do… I struggled a bit at the beginning of the term because all the tasks and deadlines were just overwhelming. However, recently, I’ve started doing something that I used to do and that’s made me feel so good about myself. That is: using a TODO app. I know it sounds incredibly boring to pretty much everyone.
